title: Mantralogix Inc. selected to serve on the Sage North American Business Partner Advisory Council
text:
(MENAFN Press) Mississauga ON (August 3 2015) – . a highly regarded Sage software Business Partner headquartered in Mississauga Ontario Canada representing the Sage ERP and CRM lines including Sage X3 Sage 300 Sage 500 and Sage 100 was recently selected to serve on the Sage Business Partner Advisory Council (BPAC). Mantralogix and Mantralogix President and Founder Kerry Mann are honored to join the BPAC.
Rich Spring EVP Chief Revenue Officer Sage North America said “I welcome and value robust collaboration and I am excited to break new ground and build greater opportunities to take our mutual businesses to the next level.
The BPAC works in conjunction with Sage leadership on initiatives aimed at success for customers partners and Sage. BPAC represents partner firms from a wide variety of locations industries market segments and competencies. Said Rich Spring “Its members represent the channel at large and share valuable perspectives and insights to help us better understand and serve the needs of our partners and customers.”
Mantralogix has in depth experience helping to improve processes and streamline automation for businesses having worked with hundreds of firms over the past 20 years. Mantralogix has encapsulated best practices in our . This eBook has been published to help other business owners understand the range of solutions that are available to them and to provide new ways to consider the challenges that lie in the path of successful business transformation.
For more information about Sage BPAC and Mantralogix’s role in the Council please contact Jess Mann at 866-320-8922.
.
Mantralogix is a trusted technology partner providing IT services and ERP/ CRM solutions to small and medium Canadian and U.S. businesses since 1996. The company’s core values help clients create change and leverage their core business strengths. Partnering with the Sage family of ERP/ CRM solutions as well as leading technology infrastructure vendors enables Mantralogix to build support and maintain successful solutions that improve their clients’ ventures from sales to operations.
